name: Bleentoro Pro
description:
Bleentoro is a simple logic game. It has no advertisements or microtransactions.

Features:
- Easy to learn
- Campaign and sandbox modes
- Simple UI
- Smooth animations

- Important note: If you are getting an error when trying to update then please uninstall previous version first. I'm really sorry for that, but that's the only solution for critical problem that I was able to find.
